title: Bug 155213[ltw] can get into a state with the Version static initializer
description: Bug 155213[ltw] can get into a state with the Version static initializer it would never be used at all in normal processingpotentially saving us from loading a bunch of underpinning junk to do the formatting...
OB: The static initializer in Version that parses the timetext string and turns it into a long field seems to sometimes get loadtime weaving into a statetouching DateFormatters early on is always a pain, so I'm moving it to be processed on first reference.I could take it a step further ... if WeaverStateInfo didn't write out the time (it doesnt read it back in!!)
